submissionsPageHints.hint: This filter container allows you to filter the learners’ submissions displayed on the table.

submissionCardsSteps.intro:
Welcome to the Submissions Page.

Here, you can manage the submissions by learners by reviewing, giving feedback and viewing learners’ reflections on feedback.
This table holds cards that represent the submissions made by a given learner.
This card holds a single learner’s submissions. Note that if there is a blue dot on the top right corner of the card, this indicates that the learner has an unreviewed submission.
